about_the_game:
Support the developer of The Lovebirds by buying the soundtrack! (Includes all the music from The Lovebirds)

The Soundtrack

  • All the music from The Lovebirds (36 songs)
  • The most memorable sound effects

Soundtrack of The Lovebirds (Duration: 1:19:54):

  • 1. A Way In Hell
  • 2. Always Yours
  • 3. Church
  • 4. Demonic Jazz Hands
  • 5. Flying
  • 6. Fog
  • 7. Forever
  • 8. Glitches Are...
  • 9. Haha
  • 10. How Did We End Up Here
  • 11. I Know
  • 12. Inside The Box
  • 13. Life Is
  • 14. Lost
  • 15. Never
  • 16. Olivia Is Gone
  • 17. Party Diantre
  • 18. Please Do Not Eat Her
  • 19. Please
  • 20. Pray
  • 21. Real Love
  • 22. Souls Can Dream
  • 23. Static
  • 24. Thank You
  • 25. That Is It
  • 26. The Sun Behind Us
  • 27. These Names Are Not A Puzzle
  • 28. Till Death I Do
  • 29. We Are The Lovebirds
  • 30. We Have Each Other
  • 31. We Were The Lovebirds
  • 32. What A Beautiful Bug
  • 33. What If They Never Did That
  • 34. Why James
  • 35. You Do Not Want To Listen To This
  • 36. You May Find This

The files are in .mp3 and .wav formats. The soundtrack will be installed in The Lovebirds' directory. You can easily access the OST by navigating to your library and going to "Music". You can also listen to the OST in-game from the Steam overlay.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1.8GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
